Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed per sprint

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of completed features per project

Name: minimize_sprint_blockers
Description: Minimize the number of active blockers during sprints

Name: maximize_worker_utilization
Description: Maximize the availability-adjusted workload of team members

Name: maximize_backlog_refinement
Description: Maximize the number of refined backlog items before sprint planning

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failures
Description: Minimize the number of sprints that fail to achieve their goal

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize satisfaction feedback from stakeholders after Sprint Reviews

Name: minimize_technical_debt
Description: Minimize unresolved issues contributing to technical debt

Name: maximize_documentation_coverage
Description: Maximize the ratio of documented features to total features

Name: maximize_sprint_effort_accuracy
Description: Promote accurate effort estimation by rewarding closeness of estimated vs actual

Name: minimize_task_context_switching
Description: Minimize the average number of tasks per user story to reduce fragmentation
